01.1.behavioral_match: Patient timing; private incubation; no premature display; waiting for mutation to ripen.
01.1.why: Lyra core — creative expression held until ripe, independent of will (quick_rule: 'artistic creation, aesthetic power').

01.2.behavioral_match: Emerges when called; meets worthy mentor; shows work to the great one.
01.2.why: Orion Light core — honorable emergence through meeting the great man (quick_rule: 'trial/initiation, mystery school').

01.2.behavioral_match: Light as beauty; harmony between values and ideals enriches inspiration.
01.2.why: Sirius secondary — love as light touches sacred instruction aspect (quick_rule: 'sacred knowledge transmission').

01.3.behavioral_match: Active and vigilant all day; careful and apprehensive; dangerous position but no mistake through sustained effort.
01.3.why: Orion Light core — sustained trial through danger with Martian endurance (quick_rule: 'honorable trial, warrior initiation').

01.4.behavioral_match: Aloneness as medium of creativity; inner tension; personal perspective outside influence.
01.4.why: Lyra core — creative expression requires solitude and freedom from interference (quick_rule: 'artistic creation, aesthetic power').

01.5.behavioral_match: Dragon on wing attracts society; powerful projection field; endurance through ego.
01.5.why: Sirius shadow — attracts society's projection but risks spiritual gatekeeping through fame (quick_rule: 'sacred knowledge transmission').

01.5.behavioral_match: Powerful ego endurance; eccentricity for attention; playing the creative role.
01.5.why: Draco secondary — survival through dominance of attention and status maintenance (quick_rule: 'hierarchical enforcement, loyalty control').

01.6.behavioral_match: Objectivity; clear assessment of creative value; wisdom perspective on mutation across generations.
01.6.why: Lyra core — artistic legacy judged across time; mutation's generational power (quick_rule: 'immortalization through beauty and art').

01.6.behavioral_match: Dragon exceeding limits; timing signal for renewal; repentance as wisdom.
01.6.why: Sirius secondary — timing signal for collective renewal and restoration (quick_rule: 'timing signal for collective renewal').
